Package org.opengrok.web.api

Class ApiTaskManager

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.web.api.ApiTaskManager
public final class ApiTaskManager extends Object
Manages asynchronous API requests.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown() throws InterruptedException
